function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Positive linear relationship between temperature and the number of COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Increased transmission of COVID-19 in warmer temperatures","Mitigation":"Continued promotion of social distancing and other protection measures in urban areas","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Urban population","Owner":"Health organizations and local authorities"},{"Description":"Drier air favors the transmission of the virus","Impact":"Increased transmission of COVID-19 in dry conditions","Mitigation":"Emphasizing the importance of indoor humidity control and ventilation in public health guidelines","Technologies":"Indoor humidifiers, ventilation systems","People":"Public and private building owners, public health agencies","Owner":"Public health agencies, building owners"},{"Description":"Limited and inconclusive evidence regarding the impact of wind speed on COVID-19 infections","Impact":"Uncertainty about the role of wind speed in COVID-19 transmission","Mitigation":"Encouraging further research to better understand the relationship between wind speed and COVID-19 transmission","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Research community, public health organizations","Owner":"Research community, public health organizations"}]}
